name: Night of the Soulless Heathens
author: Hong Jung Hoon &#40홍정훈&#41
content: The Herald Clan is a clan of untouchables, persecuted as soulless heretics.In order to break free of the curse they&#039ve inherited, they roamed the continent in order to gather the Emperor&#039s Golden Coins.And even amongst the heretics, Azadin bore the worst curse.Having zero talent for magic, he became the lowest-ranked herald with the skills he was taught by an elder.
